location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed on paper.Dimensions: 300 x 185mm, on sheet 305 x 188mm.

mods.abstract: This map shows Yemen (including the Aden Protectorate), Asir and the surrounding region, including parts of French Somaliland [Djibouti] and Hejaz. The map, which was reproduced by the Survey of Egypt, shows approximate boundaries of Yemen, Asir, the Aden Protectorate, and Hejaz in blue crayon.
